title: Seriously so good!!!
review: LOVED this! So many subtle, hilarious moments, and so much depth & dimension to the characters. Definitely not your typical rom-com movie. I adore how witty and brilliantly funny the writing is in this. 10/10 would recommend. A must see!!!

title: What a great movie!! I laughed, I cried and I was uplifted. It really hits all of you emotions!! Kudos to the cast and the writers, directors and producers!!
review: Awesome movie! Great cast and crew!! I watched with friends and relatives and they all loved it!!

title: not a bad wedding comedy
review:
Every wedding comedy goes through the same story arc so not much originality there. yet the sporatic comedy was pretty good. i enjoyed the actors and felt they were all cast perfectly

6.1
